declarations.comments: A type synonym for a `RWSET` with `Identity` as its base monad.
declarations.title: RWSE

declarations.comments:
Create an `RWSE` monad from a function that takes the environment
and the state, and returns a new state, an error or a result, and
an accumulator.
declarations.title: rwse

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `RWSE`.
declarations.title: runRWSE

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `RWSE`, discarding the final state.
declarations.title: evalRWSE

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `RWSE`, discarding the final result.
declarations.title: execRWSE

declarations.comments: Modifies the result and accumulator types of a `RWSE`.
declarations.title: mapRWSE

declarations.comments: Modifies the environment type of a `RWSE`.
declarations.title: withRWSE

modules.name: Uncurried.RWSET
modules.comments:
This module defines the reader-writer-state-error monad
transformer, `RWSET`.

declarations.comments:
The reader-writer-state-error monad transformer, which combines the
functionality of `ReaderT`, `WriterT`, `StateT`, and `ExceptT` into
a single monad transformer.
declarations.title: RWSET

declarations.comments:
Create an `RWSE` monad from a function that takes the environment
and the state, and returns a new state, an error or a result, and
an accumulator.
declarations.title: rwseT

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `RWSET`.
declarations.title: runRWSET

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `RWSET`, discarding the final state.
declarations.title: evalRWSET

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `RWSET`, discarding the final result.
declarations.title: execRWSET

declarations.comments: Modifies the monadic context of a `RWSET`.
declarations.title: hoistRWSET

declarations.comments: Modifies the result and accumulator types of a `RWSET`.
declarations.title: mapRWSET

declarations.comments: Modifies the environment type of a `RWSET`.
declarations.title: withRWSET

declarations.comments: A type synonym for a `ReaderT` with `Identity` as its base monad.
declarations.title: Reader

declarations.comments: Construct a `Reader` given a function that requires some context.
declarations.title: reader

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `Reader`.
declarations.title: runReader

declarations.comments: Modifies the result type of a `Reader`.
declarations.title: mapReader

declarations.comments: Modifies the environment type of a `Reader`.
declarations.title: withReader

modules.name: Uncurried.ReaderT
modules.comments: This module defines the reader monad transformer, `ReaderT`.

declarations.comments:
The reader monad transformer, implemented as a newtytpe over
`RWSET`. Note that it's not recommended to stack newtypes of
`RWSET` together as it incurs an indeterminate performance
penalty that would otherwise be solved by just using `RWSET`.
declarations.title: ReaderT

declarations.comments: Construct a `ReaderT` given a function that requires some context.
declarations.title: readerT

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `ReaderT`.
declarations.title: runReaderT

declarations.comments: Modifies the monadic context of a `ReaderT`.
declarations.title: hoistReaderT

declarations.comments: Modifies the result type of a `ReaderT`.
declarations.title: mapReaderT

declarations.comments: Modifies the environment type of a `ReaderT`.
declarations.title: withReaderT

declarations.comments: A type synonym for a `StateT` with `Identity` as its base monad.
declarations.title: State

declarations.comments: Construct a `State` given a function that treads through some state.
declarations.title: state

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `State`.
declarations.title: runState

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `State`, discarding the final state.
declarations.title: evalState

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `State`, discarding the final result.
declarations.title: execState

declarations.comments: Modifies the result type of a `State`.
declarations.title: mapState

declarations.comments: Modifies the state of a `State`.
declarations.title: withState

modules.name: Uncurried.StateT
modules.comments: This module defines the state monad transformer, `StateT`.

declarations.comments:
The state monad transformer, implemented as a newtype over
`RWSET`. Note that it's not recommended to stack newtypes of
`RWSET` together as it incurs an indeterminate performance
penalty that would otherwise be solved by just using `RWSET`.
declarations.title: StateT

declarations.comments: Construct a `StateT` given a function that treads through some state.
declarations.title: stateT

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `StateT`.
declarations.title: runStateT

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `StateT`, discarding the final state.
declarations.title: evalStateT

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `StateT`, discarding the final result.
declarations.title: execStateT

declarations.comments: Modifies the monadic context of a `StateT`.
declarations.title: hoistStateT

declarations.comments: Modifies the result type of a `StateT`.
declarations.title: mapStateT

declarations.comments: Modifies the state of a `StateT`.
declarations.title: withStateT

modules.name: Uncurried.Writer
modules.comments: This modules defines the writer monad, `Writer`.

declarations.comments: A type synonym for a `WriterT` with `Identity` as its base monad.
declarations.title: Writer

declarations.comments: Create a `Writer` monad from a pair of a result and an accumulator.
declarations.title: writer

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `Writer`.
declarations.title: runWriter

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `Writer`, discarding the final accumulator.
declarations.title: evalWriter

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `Writer`, discarding the final result.
declarations.title: execWriter

declarations.comments: Modifies the result and accumulator types of a `Writer`.
declarations.title: mapWriter

modules.name: Uncurried.WriterT
modules.comments: This module defines the writer monad transformer, `WriterT`.

declarations.comments:
The writer monad transformer, implemented as a newtype over
`RWSET`. Note that it's not recommended to stack newtypes of
`RWSET` together as it incurs an indeterminate performance
penalty that would otherwise be solved by just using `RWSET`.
declarations.title: WriterT

declarations.comments: Create a `Writer` monad from a pair of a result and an accumulator.
declarations.title: writerT

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `WriterT`.
declarations.title: runWriterT

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `WriterT`, discarding the final accumulator.
declarations.title: evalWriterT

declarations.comments: Runs a computation inside of `WriterT`, discarding the final result.
declarations.title: execWriterT

declarations.comments: Modifies the monadic context of a `WriterT`.
declarations.title: hoistWriterT

declarations.comments: Modifies the result and accumulator types of a `WriterT`.
declarations.title: mapWriterT
